item.description:
RSVP's for this event will be closed by 9 pm Friday night August 31. Info on how to find us at the park will be sent by 9 am Saturday morning Sept 1.  : )

Join us for outdoor theater in New Haven's historic Edgerton Park. Performances are free but with a suggested donation of $20 for adults and $10 for students. Bring a blanket or chair. Picnics encouraged! BYOB. Find more information at www.elmshakespeare.org.

Christine will Host this meetup.  If you have any questions, please e-mail her Here! She'll provide contact information to the "Yes" RSVP's the day before the event.

Elm Shakespeare Company kicks off its 17th season with a production of Macbeth featuring James Andreassi as Macbeth and Marianna Bassham as Lady Macbeth. This not-for-profit theater group's has become a summer staple in New Haven and not to be missed!

Authentically set and clothed in the Scotland of its setting, the play includes combat scenes with broad swordplay. The set and the costumes are spectacular aiming at a ‘Game of Thrones’ look and feel.

Founded in 1995, The Elm Shakespeare Company is a professional, multicultural theatre company committed to establishing a discourse with Connecticut communities and schools through the medium of Shakespeare’s plays. Since then, audiences have grown to over 30,000 attending performances throughout the month of August.

Contact information and instructions on how to find us will be emailed to Yes RSVP's the day before the event.
item.how_to_find_us: Christine will provide Contact Information to the YES RSVP's the Day before the Event.
item.name: Shakespeare in the Park
